subject: Can't access my account
description: I'm unable to login to my account. I've tried resetting my password but still cannot access the system.

subject: Production system down
description: Our production environment is completely down and affecting all users. This is critical.

subject: Billing discrepancy
description: I was charged twice for my subscription this month. Please investigate and refund the duplicate charge.

subject: Feature request for dark mode
description: It would be nice to have a dark mode option in the application for better usability at night.

subject: Bug in checkout process
description: When I try to checkout with a discount code
category: the system shows an error. The error message says 'Invalid discount code' but the code is correct.

subject: 2FA not working
description: I cannot login because the two-factor authentication code is not being sent to my phone.

subject: Performance issues
description: The application is running very slow. Page loads are taking 30 seconds or more.

subject: Invoice not received
description: I haven't received my invoice for last month's subscription. Please send it to my registered email.

subject: Suggest improvement for notifications
description: The notification system could be improved by allowing users to customize notification preferences for different event types.

subject: Application crashes on startup
description: The application crashes immediately after launching. The error log shows 'NullPointerException in initialization'.

subject: Password reset link expired
description: The password reset link I received has expired and I cannot create a new password.

subject: Database connection error
description: Getting persistent database connection errors when trying to save data.

subject: Refund request
description: I would like to request a refund for my last purchase as I am not satisfied with the service.

subject: Add export to Excel
description: Could you please add an export to Excel feature for the reports section?

subject: Data not saving properly
description: When I update my profile information and click save
category: the changes are not persisted in the system.

subject: Cannot verify account
description: I've submitted my verification documents but the system shows 'verification pending' for over a week.

subject: API rate limit exceeded
description: We're hitting the API rate limit too quickly and need higher limits for our integration.

subject: Subscription renewal failed
description: My subscription renewal failed. The payment went through but my subscription status was not updated.

subject: UI responsiveness on mobile
description: The mobile UI is not responsive on small screens and buttons are overlapping.

subject: Add multi-language support
description: It would be great to have the application available in multiple languages.

subject: Security concern with API keys
description: I'm concerned about the security of API keys stored in local storage. Are they encrypted?

subject: Payment method not accepted
description: My payment method (Visa card) is being rejected during checkout.

subject: New analytics dashboard
description: Would be great to have a more comprehensive analytics dashboard with custom reports.

subject: Email notifications broken
description: I stopped receiving email notifications. My email address is verified but no emails are coming through.

subject: Account locked due to failed login
description: My account has been locked after several failed login attempts. I need to unlock it.

subject: Timeout error on large file upload
description: When uploading files larger than 50MB

subject: Duplicate charge reversal
description: I was charged twice and one charge needs to be reversed immediately.

subject: Suggestion for batch operations
description: It would be useful to have batch operations for managing multiple items at once.

subject: Report generation fails
description: The custom report generation feature crashes when trying to export large datasets.

subject: Cannot update billing address
description: The billing address update form keeps showing validation errors even with correct data.

subject: SSO integration issue
description: Single Sign-On with our corporate IdP is not working properly.

subject: Import failing silently
description: Data import completes but no records are actually created in the system.

subject: API documentation missing
description: The API endpoints for batch operations are not documented.

subject: Invoice formatting issue
description: Invoices are being generated but text formatting is broken with overlapping content.

subject: Third-party integration timeout
description: Our integration with the payment processor is timing out intermittently.

subject: Workflow automation request
description: We need workflow automation to reduce manual data entry processes.

subject: Session timeout too short
description: The session timeout is too aggressive and logs me out during active work.

subject: Two-factor setup unclear
description: The setup process for two-factor authentication is confusing and not well documented.

subject: Partial payment option needed
description: We need the ability to make partial payments on invoices instead of lump sum payments.

subject: Webhook delivery failed
description: Webhooks are not being delivered to our endpoint even though they appear to be configured correctly.

subject: Critical security patch needed
description: There is a critical security vulnerability in the password reset mechanism that needs immediate patching.

subject: Audit log export needed
description: We need to export audit logs in CSV format for compliance purposes.

subject: Cache invalidation bug
description: The application cache is not being invalidated properly after updates.

subject: Mobile app crashes on Android
description: The mobile app crashes on Android devices when accessing the dashboard.

subject: Database backup verification
description: We need to verify that our database backups are being created successfully.

subject: Multi-currency support
description: Please add support for multiple currencies in the billing system.

subject: SSL certificate expiration
description: The SSL certificate will expire in 30 days. It needs to be renewed urgently.

subject: Contact us form not working
description: The contact form on the website is not sending emails to our support address.

subject: Improve search functionality
description: The search feature should support advanced filtering and saved searches.

subject: Critical production incident
description: Our production database is showing signs of corruption. Data integrity is at risk.
